00014 #include <string>
00015 using namespace std;
00016 
00017 class EdwBoloSystemRecordBase : public EdwSystemRecordBase { 
00018 
00019 public:
00020         //Constructors
00021         EdwBoloSystemRecordBase(void);
00022         EdwBoloSystemRecordBase(const EdwBoloSystemRecordBase &aSysRec);
00023         EdwBoloSystemRecordBase& operator=(const EdwBoloSystemRecordBase &aSysRec);
00024         virtual ~EdwBoloSystemRecordBase(void);
00025         virtual void Clear(Option_t *opt = "C");
00026         Bool_t IsSame(const EdwBoloSystemRecordBase &aRec, Bool_t bPrint = false) const;
00027         Bool_t operator==(const EdwBoloSystemRecordBase &aRec) const { return IsSame(aRec,false); }
00028         Bool_t operator!=(const EdwBoloSystemRecordBase &aRec) const { return !(*this==aRec); }
00029         virtual void Compact(void);
00030         
00031         //getters
00032         //Double_t GetTimeSinceLastBoloSysEvent(void) const;
00033         string GetRunName(void) const {return fRunName;}
00034         Int_t GetRunYear(void) const {return fRunName.compare(0,1,"a") + 2000;}
00035         Int_t GetRunMonth(void) const {return fRunName.compare(1,1,"a") + 1;}
00036         Int_t GetRunDay(void) const {return atoi(fRunName.substr(2,2).c_str());}
00037         
00038         //setters
00039         //void SetTimeSinceLastBoloSysEvent(Double_t aNum);
00040         void SetRunName(string aWord) {fRunName=aWord.substr(0,4);}  //only save the first four characters
00041         //of the run name since the remaining characters are mac/hour specific.
00042 
00043         
00044 private:
00045         
00046         string fRunName;
00047         
00048         
00049         //Int_t fNumBoloHits; //how is this calcuated exactly? Maybe this value will in the Base
00050         //would be the number of bolo sub records... but then we're just reproducing a member
00051         //variable that is already there. In the HLA record, there should be a number
00052         //that tells you how many bolometers have a "signifcant" event, not just now 
00053         //many subrecords there are. But then, in the HLA event, should we only write
00054         //out bolo sub records for "significant" events? How High is the HLA? 
00055
